ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 203
ygData.msgSnippet: i know there are a few quests you can do, but if your faction is low enough you cant complete the quests- its hard to turn in an item to someone who will kill
ygData.messageBody:
i know there are a few quests you can do, but if your faction is low enough
you cant complete the quests- its hard to turn in an item to someone who
will kill you =)


>From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 203
>Date: Mon, 20 Dec 1999 13:31:25 PST
>
>Actually, there is a habvling skullcap quest you can do to raise your
>faction with Indigo Brotherhood.
>
>
>>From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 203
>>Date: Sun, 19 Dec 1999 15:01:49 PST
>>
>>if you are evil, never, EVER kill cb orcs. you will never regain your
>>faction with the indigo brotherhood. if you are de (or even not) killing
>>orcs in the commons will raise your faction with freeport (a very good
>>thing) as well as some other ones. and there are no bad penalties either.
>>
>>belphenor
>>
>>
>>>From: "Luigi" <luigi@...>
>>>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 203
>>>Date: Sun, 19 Dec 1999 13:48:46 -0400
>>>
>>>If your DE i would recomend fighting orcs. At least the ones in Crushbone
>>>lower your faction with Indigo Brotherhood and you might not be able to
>>>go
>>>home :) just kill one and check the factionhits
>>>
>>>Kumilia DE Necro 11th
